definitions.definition: a long and determined attempt to achieve something that you believe in strongly:
examples: They have long been involved in a crusade for racial equality.

definitions.definition: one of the religious wars (= crusades) fought by Christians, mostly against Muslims in Palestine, in the 11th, 12th, 13th, and 17th centuries
to make an effort to achieve something that you believe in strongly:
examples: She crusaded against sex and violence on television.
